postAuthor: After having a rough time due to medical complications, my kids were needing new school clothes for the year.  I came to Be a Neighbor and was able to get some clothes for all 4 of them from this great community

I am so happy I found this website.  I have always wanted to know who my donated items are going to and now I have this site so that I can directly donate to an individual or family who is really in need.
